A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie had wonderful visuals and some interesting scenes. However\, as a whole it is the worst movie in the Star Wars series. It completely destroys the rules/lore of the universe and has way too many plot holes. It's also filled with terrible comedy that fails to land and is out of place in many scenes. If you are a die hard SW fan you probably won't like it. If you are a casual movie goer\, I'm sure you will enjoy the movie.
